short_description: fastpath function for assigning data points to Kmeans clusters.
long_description: fastpath function for assigning data points to Kmeans clusters.

input_tables.name: ModelTable
input_tables.rDescription: The ModelTable input containing KMeans cluster centroids generated by TD_KMeans.
input_tables.description: The ModelTable input containing KMeans cluster centroids generated by TD_KMeans.

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.rDescription: The relation that contains input data.
input_tables.description: The relation that contains input data.

argument_clauses.name: Accumulate
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the input table columns to copy to the output table. By default, the function copies no input table columns to the output table.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input table columns to copy to the output table. By default, the function copies no input table columns to the output table.

argument_clauses.name: OutputDistance
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies whether to output the distance between each data point and the nearest cluster.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies whether to output the distance between each data point and the nearest cluster.
